elements.name: panel1
elements.title: Write down which principle the following abbreviations stand for and describe the principle in your own words.

elements.name: question1
elements.title: FIFO:
elements.correctAnswer: First in – First out: Die Artikel, die zuerst eingelagert wurden, werden auch zuerst ausgelagert.

elements.name: question4
elements.title: FEFO:
elements.correctAnswer: First expired – First out: Die Artikel mit dem frühesten Ablaufdatum werden zuerst ausgelagert.

elements.name: question2
elements.title: LIFO:
elements.correctAnswer: Last in - First out: The items that were put away last are removed first.

elements.name: panel2
elements.title: Name the goods/groups of goods that are sorted according to the respective principle.

elements.name: question3
elements.title: FIFO:
elements.correctAnswer: Non-food items, goods affected by depreciation over time

elements.name: question5
elements.title: FEFO:
elements.correctAnswer: Food, goods with an expiration date

elements.name: question6
elements.title: LIFO:
elements.correctAnswer: Building materials such as gravel, stones, etc.; heavy objects that have no expiration date and are difficult to move (concrete slabs, iron bars, etc.)
